nodes.text: The Alliance to Restore the Republic held guiding principles by their settlement of Hoth in 3 ABY. According to scholar Korin Aphra, four of such concepts echoes that of Jedi texts. Certain Alliance Military members, however, namely Captain Magna Tolvan, had no interest in the principles.
The Alliance guiding principles were mentioned in the 2019 Star Wars comic Empire Ascendant 1's story "Epilogue."
